shrill.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a shrill sound is very high and unpleasant
shrill.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: ‘That’s not true, ’ she protested in a shrill voice.
shrill.translation[0].definitions[1].def: shrill complaints, criticism, demands etc are too loud or strong and seem unreasonable
shrill.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: He hated the shrill demands of the children.
shrill.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to produce a very high and unpleasant sound
shrill.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to say something in a very high voice
